profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.3.5 Font subsets - CharSet entry in Type1 subsets
profile.description: For all Type 1 font subsets referenced within a conforming file, the font descriptor dictionary shall include a CharSet string listing the character names defined in the font subset, as described in PDF Reference Table 5.18
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium
